articles.title: Trump and Xi Approve TikTok Deal After Phone Call
articles.summary: US President **Donald Trump** and China's President **Xi Jinping** reached agreement on a **TikTok** deal during Friday phone discussions. The leaders aim to ease trade tensions between the two superpowers and resolve the social media platform's future in America after months of negotiations.

timeline.event: TikTok faces potential US ban over security concerns
Negotiations begin between US and Chinese officials
Trump and Xi schedule phone call for final discussions
Historic deal approved ending months of uncertainty

articles.title: Trump Administration Adds $100,000 Fee for H-1B Visas
articles.summary: The **Trump administration** announced a new **$100,000** fee for **H-1B visa** applications, dramatically increasing costs for companies hiring foreign skilled workers. This unprecedented charge represents a major shift in US immigration policy affecting technology companies and other industries relying on international talent.

articles.title: Three Deaths Linked to Optus Network Upgrade Failure
articles.summary: **Optus** CEO confirmed **three people died** when a network upgrade affected **triple-zero emergency calls**. South Australia's Premier **Peter Malinauskas** accused the telecommunications company of reprehensible conduct over its delayed disclosure of the fatal incidents during critical system maintenance work.

articles.title: UN Security Council Reimposes Iran Nuclear Sanctions
articles.summary: The **UN Security Council** voted Friday to reimpose deep economic sanctions on **Iran** over its resurgent nuclear program. **Britain, France and Germany** called for action against Tehran's violations of the **2015 JCPOA deal** intended to prevent nuclear weapons development.

articles.title: CDC Panel Limits Covid Vaccine to High-Risk Groups
articles.summary: A **CDC advisory panel** voted to restrict this fall's **Covid vaccine** eligibility to people **65 and older** or those with underlying health conditions. Healthy adults and children may face insurance roadblocks accessing shots under the new recommendations changing pandemic-era universal vaccination policies.

articles.title: Boeing Nears 250-Jet Order from Turkey Ahead of Summit
articles.summary: **Boeing** is close to securing a **250-aircraft order** from **Turkey** as President **Trump** prepares to meet President **Erdogan**. The massive deal would boost Boeing's order book significantly and strengthen US-Turkey trade relations amid ongoing diplomatic discussions between the nations.

articles.title: Jimmy Kimmel Live Crew Gets Pay as Show Remains Suspended
articles.summary: **Jimmy Kimmel Live** crew will receive payment next week while the show remains indefinitely pre-empted following controversial monologue comments. **Disney executives** and **Kimmel** continue discussions about the program's future after the **Trump administration** criticized remarks about Charlie Kirk's suspected killer.

articles.title: NASA Selects Blue Origin for Moon South Pole Mission
articles.summary: **NASA** awarded **Blue Origin** a contract to deliver the **VIPER rover** to the **Moon's south pole** as part of the Artemis campaign. The Commercial Lunar Payload Services task order advances exploration of lunar water ice deposits critical for future human missions.

articles.title: Mexico City Tanker Explosion Death Toll Reaches 22
articles.summary: The death toll from a **liquefied petroleum gas tanker** explosion in **Mexico City** has risen to **22**, health officials confirmed. The tragedy sparked widespread anger and renewed attention to safety conditions for hazardous material transport through densely populated urban areas.

articles.title: FDA Approves First Treatment for Rare Barth Syndrome
articles.summary: The **FDA** granted accelerated approval to **FORZINITY** (elamipretide HCl), the first therapy for **Barth syndrome**, an ultra-rare genetic disease. **Stealth BioTherapeutics** developed this breakthrough treatment for the progressive, life-limiting condition affecting mitochondrial function primarily in young males worldwide.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Global tech and policy shifts dominate today.

historicalEvents.description: Magellan begins first successful circumnavigation of Earth
Italian troops capture Rome, ending Papal temporal power
First Cannes Film Festival opens in France
President Bush declares War on Terror in Congress
